doc:
Ismael Merlo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ismael_Merlo 0 Ismael Merlo (1 September 1918 – 10 September 1984) was a Spanish actor. He appeared in 82 films and television shows between 1941 and 1984. He starred in the 1966 film La caza, which won the Silver Bear for Best Director at the 16th Berlin International Film Festival. Ismael_Merlo ( 1_September_1918 – 10_September_1984 ) was a_Spanish_actor . He appeared in 82_films_and_television_shows between 1941_and_1984 . He starred in the_1966_film La_caza , which won the_Silver Bear_for_Best_Director at the_16th_Berlin_International_Film_Festival .
